attributes.action: Ban people from buying tickets and selling them for large profits
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition campaigning for the instant ban of people buying tickets and selling them instantly for a large profit. Websites that you can download free music from are being banned, so why aren't websites where people sell tickets for such ridiculous prices.
Seat wave should be banned and anyone who buys a ticket and attempts to sell it for more than face value should have their ticket revoked, so that it can be given to someone who wants to go to said event.
